name: Catmail
description:
PLAY IT FULLSCREEN
___________________________STORY___________________________

You are travelling and you cat misses you. 

Send her letter so she knows you lover her. 

 

___________________________CONTROLS___________________________

MOVE: Use the mouse cursor

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON: Creates balls

RESTART: R

WRITE THE LETTER: Put love into it. 

___________________________OBJECTIVE___________________________

Get the letter (blue ball) to the cat. 

___________________________THE TEAM___________________________

Ernani Rocha - Game Designer / Programmer @playturtlejuice

PsY SurF - Music 

https://soundcloud.com/psysurf

Helped me a lot: Barbara and Bash. Love you both.
